mapper.select: SELECT od.product_code, sum(od.order_amount) "sum_order_amount", sum(od.order_price) "sum_order_price", o.table_code, p.product_name FROM orders_detail od, orders o, product p WHERE od.order_code = o.order_code and od.product_code = p.product_code AND od.order_code IN ( SELECT order_code FROM orders WHERE order_state = 0 ) and o.table_code = #{tableCode} group by o.table_code, od.product_code, p.product_name order by o.table_code, product_code
